sentences.en: A cellist is always shortening and lengthening the strings.
sentences.cn: 大提琴演奏家总是在压缩或拉长弦

sentences.en: Casals: Spanish cellist considered the greatest of his time.
sentences.cn: 卡萨奥: 西班牙大提琴家,被认为是他所处时代最伟大的大提琴家.

sentences.en: Daigo loses his job as a cellist, returns to his inaka roots and stumbles into a job as an undertaker.
sentences.cn: 醍醐失去了他的工作，作为一个大提琴家，回到他的田舍根和跌倒到一份工作作为一个单位。

sentences.en: His younger brother, Julian Lloyd Webber a world - famous cellist.
sentences.cn: 他的弟弟, 朱利安劳埃德韦伯是世界著名的大提琴家.

sentences.en: Performed consecutively and in order, as they were by the cellist David Finckel and the pianist Wu Han in Alice Tully Hall on Sunday evening, they provide a vivid snapshot of his artistic development.
sentences.cn: 上周日晚，在爱丽丝杜利音乐大厅，大提琴家大卫·芬科尔和钢琴家吴涵依次演奏了这五部作品，为听众清晰呈现了贝多芬音乐艺术的发展。

sentences.en: The cellist's bowing was very sensitive .
sentences.cn: 那位大提琴手的弓法十分细腻。

sentences.en: The cellist's bowing was very sensitive.
sentences.cn: 那位大提琴手的弓法十分细腻.

sentences.en: The concert was a solo played by Yo Yo Ma, who is an excellent cellist.
sentences.cn: 这场音乐会是马友友独奏，他是一位优秀的大提琴家。

sentences.en: The music was also of the highest caliber , including tenor Placido Domingo and cellist Yo - Yo Ma .
sentences.cn: 音乐表演也是首屈一指,表演者有男高音歌唱家多明戈和大提琴演奏家 马友友.

sentences.en: The music was also of the highest caliber, including tenor Placido Domingo and cellist Yo-Yo Ma.
sentences.cn: 音乐表演也是一流的，有男高音歌唱家多明戈和大提琴演奏家马友友。

sentences.en: The music was also the highest caliber, including Tenor tenor Placido Domingo and cellist Yo - Yo Ma .
sentences.cn: 音乐也是最高标准, 包括男高音多明戈和大提琴演奏家 马友友.

sentences.en: The music was also the highest callerbecaliber, including tenor Placido Domingo and cellist Yo - Yo Ma .
sentences.cn: 音乐也是最顶级的阵容, 包括男高音多明戈和大提琴家 马友友.

sentences.en: Who can deny his stature as the world's greatest cellist?
sentences.cn: 谁能否认他是世界上最伟大的大提琴演奏家呢？

sentences.en: World - renowned cellist Yo - Yo Ma founded The Silk Road Project in 1998.
sentences.cn: 世界闻名的大提琴家 马友友 于1998年创建了丝路工程.

sentences.en: World renowned cellist Yo - Yo Ma founded The Silk Road Project in 1998.
sentences.cn: 1998年世界知名大提琴家 马友友 建立了丝绸之路方案.
